explains: adj. 奇迹般的，不可思议的；超自然的

sentences.en: She had a miraculous quality of touch, a seemingly autonomous left hand; no artist in her generation could clarify with such deftness the polyphonic writing of the Baroque masters.
sentences.cn: 她有一种神奇的触觉，似乎是一个自主的左手；在她那一代人中，没有哪位艺术家能如此娴熟地阐释巴洛克大师们的复调写作。

sentences.en: The horse made a miraculous recovery to finish a close third.
sentences.cn: 这匹马奇迹般地缓过劲来，最终以微弱的差距获得了第三名。
